description: Detects Microsoft Excel loading an Add-In (.xll) file from an uncommon location
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Some tuning might be required to allow or remove certain locations used by the rule if you consider them as safe locations
name: Microsoft Excel Add-In Loaded From Uncommon Location
query: (process.executable.text:"*\\excel.exe" AND dll.path:(*\\Desktop\\* OR *\\Downloads\\* OR *\\Perflogs\\* OR *\\Temp\\* OR *\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\Windows\\Tasks\\*) AND dll.path:*.xll)
